long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feedcrm is the ultimate CRM for your Linkedin Feed! Our revolutionary product helps you stay organized and connected with the people you follow. 

It scans your Linkedin Feed quickly and efficiently, allowing you to see the latest posts of people you follow. 

With Feedcrm, you can easily keep track of people you are networking with, and engage with them in a more meaningful way.
